"Woah Dude Void, why do you always do that?  Stop sneaking up on 
us."  Lepord says.

"Other means, like what?"  Lady Right says.

"I could always expirment on him."  Lobstruck says.

"Woah, Cool!"  Lepord yells.

"Okay, On 3 I am going to open the door and we all blast him."  Lady 
Right Whispered to where she knew Thirst could not hear 
him.  "1...2...3!!!"  Lady Right yells as she presses the button to 
open the door.

When the door slides open Lepord fires 4 blast from his Gut gun and 4 
Optic Lasers.  Lady Right fires 4 Eye Lasers and fires 25 rapid fire 
bullets from her legs(Like Black Aracnids).  Lobstruck fires 5 Eye 
Lasers at Thirst's Head.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> As lady right suggests the notion of killing Thirst, a figred 
adorned in 
> black robes moves out from the shadows, seemingly melting out from 
them. A 
> large matellic claw is raised and placed upon her hand as two 
glowing white 
> eyes shin from beneath the figures hood.
> 
> Void: "His death.. is not neccessary.... he can benefit us another 
way..."
